column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So the food. You start with huge chunks of delicious bread and butter. Two thumbs up. I ordered the 10 oz filet mignon and my girlfriend got the roasted chicken. Steak was phenomenal. Perfectly cooked
column4: everything you could want. Chicken was super succulent and so tasty too. For sides we got the truffle mac n cheese and butternut squash. Both great. (I'm running out of adjectives)
